page.title: 16SPORTS
page.content: On{Wednesday 19th June}we had our sports day . All the class took part.I went in for the flat race and the {three legged race}with Claire Morris. We did not expect to win because when we were practising we kept tripping up.After the{three legged}was the {skipping race.}Susan Palmer came first and I came second.Then we had a long wait because the girls{long distance race was number fifty two.While I was waiting I went and got a lolly.Then it was time to go to the start and line up.We had to run round the track one and a half times. The team points were added up and Red had won.They did a lap of honour carrying the trophy.We just had time to put the chairs away before the thunder started. Debbie Barker
